The course starts at 15th of April 2024 with an introductory lecture 10:00 to 12:00 am at room  MA 742. This lecture will cover the organization of the course and answer all question around the course content and
. This term the course will not be limited in the number of students.

There are four ingredients of learning implemented in the course. First an online lecture on quantitative methods. You are supposed to study this course carefully. The course contains of 44 lectures. The lectures 1 to 34 will be part of the
. The lectures 35 to 44 are add on material, but also important in the future dealing with machine learning and neural network.

Second a short lecture on the freeware “R”. The freeware offers all content for quantitative statistical analytics and is free of charge. All other statistical packages are very expensive (SPSS, Stata etc.). Studying this “R” will not be examined, but it is a very good complementary knowledge to the other course content.
Third, for those who rather like text instead of video and audio there will be a web-book. The web-book mainly contains the same as the online lecture and should be studied as entire book.
Online Statistics Education: A Multimedia Course of Study (http://onlinestatbook.com/).
date is 15th of July 2024 at 10:00 to 12:00 am, all other
